name: Let Me Tell You How Rumplestiltskin Really Went
name_original: Let Me Tell You How Rumplestiltskin Really Went
description: Let Me Tell You How Rumplestiltskin Really Went is a modern re-telling of the Grimm Brothers' original Rumpelstiltskin. Through the narrative lens of the miller's daughter and soon-to-be queen, we explore her life in the castle and beyond looking out for the moments where we might meet the hob-goblin himself, get into some dangerous situations, live happily ever after, or run away forever.
